full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` GDON BGEGS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR NAG PHYOGS PA'I 'KHON GNOD SEL THABS BKRA SHIS DGA' 'KHYIL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES GDON BGEGS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR NAG PHYOGS PA'I 'KHON GNOD SEL THABS BKRA SHIS BKA' 'KHYIL ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NYID RIGS DUS SHING DU MTHO ZHING DAD DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA DZA SAG AO LO SOGS THU SHI GUNG BA THUR TAS CHEN BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS DANG, AA NING KHE LA THUG THAS BTZUN MO BRTZON GRUB PA DANG` SRAS PA THUR TAS CHEN RDO RJE PHAL LAM DANG, BTZUN DAR RGYAS SOGS KYI SKU'I RIM 'GROS DMIGS NAS, RIG 'DZIN HE DZA BADZRAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I SLOB BU 'PHRIN LAS STOBS LDAN GYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
